entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 7. POP 60%
entry.summary: Rain showers or flurries changing to snow and ending this evening then mainly cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Snowfall amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind south 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming northwest 30 gusting to 50 this evening. Low minus 7. Wind chill minus 16 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM ADT Thursday 30 March 2023

entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries. High plus 4. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries in the morning then a mix of sun and cloud. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. High plus 4. Wind chill minus 16 in the morning. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:00 PM ADT Thursday 30 March 2023
